title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.6 - Petty cash
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.6 - Petty cash

State Regulations

Limited payment of claims from petty cash must have the same
supporting documentation as for vouchered payments. Reimbursement of the petty
cash account is done in accordance with normal petty cash
procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
19.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
